posts.title: Thug Kitchen Cookbook
posts.content: Stop devouring processed crap and start eating like a healthy individual by following the recipes in the Thug Kitchen cookbook. This foul-mouthed read cuts right to the chase by showing you how to cook healthy and simple plates from scratch without wasting time.

posts.title: Wood Burning Pen
posts.content: Easily create amazing works of art over all types of wooden surfaces using this wood burning pen. Designed for wooden and leather surfaces, this handy tool comes with variable temperature control and eleven interchangeable tips with a lead-free solder.

posts.title: Off-Grid Solar Panel Backpack
posts.content: Ensure your electronic devices remain juiced up when you venture away from the city by toting this off-grid solar panel backpack. This 10W backpack comes with a large panel that can charge your smartphone in just 2 hours in addition to a 12,000mAh backup battery.

posts.title: Chewable Coffee Cubes
posts.content: Get your fix of caffeine on the go with these delicious chewable coffee cubes. These gummy candy edibles pack the distinct flavor and energy boost of real coffee – so you can stay energized even when you don’t have your fancy lattee machine nearby.

posts.title: Personal Fondue Mugs
posts.content: Enjoy your favorite Swiss treat without the hassle of melting an entire pots-worth of cheese by opting for these personal fondue mugs. You simply place your melted cheese or chocolate inside the mug while the candle underneath keeps it at the perfect temperature.

posts.title: Living Wall Garden Starter Kit
posts.content: Bring your humble abode’s plain walls to life using this living wall garden starter kit. Ideal for homes with limited space, this vertical garden installs in seconds so you can keep a lively and healthy garden on any wall without making a mess.

posts.title: .308 Real Bullet Shot Glass
posts.content: Combine your love of partying and firearms by downing your liquor with one of these .308 real bullet shot glasses. Each shot glass comes with a real .308 bullet lodged into the side and is handmade to ensure each piece is 100% unique.

posts.title: Stash Bag Pillow Case
posts.content: Drift off into a pleasant night’s slumber as you count nugs of top shelf ganja when sleeping on the stash bag pillow case. Apart from the alluring exterior, the pillow case features a hidden compartment ideal for hiding all your “sleep” paraphernalia.

posts.title: Pop Up Tent
posts.content: Roughing it in the great outdoors just got a bit easier thanks to the pop up tent. This high quality tent comes pre-assembled and pops open in a snap, leaving you with more time for the important tasks like foraging for berries, fishing at the lake, and gathering firewood.

posts.title: Swarovski Crystal Star Wars Sculptures
posts.content: Make every Star Wars geek in the galaxy green with envy by placing these magnificent Swarovski Crystal character sculptures on display. These out-of-this-world figurines are masterfully crafted to faithfully resemble their on-screen counterparts in striking detail.

posts.title: Scorpion Blade
posts.content: Strike fear in the heart of the enemy when you show up to do battle armed with the scorpion blade. The weapon stretches 14.5 inches overall and comes stocked with a slew of blades along the sides in addition to a deadly curved stinger blade.

posts.title: Pop Out Outlet
posts.content: Hide the electrical outlets when not in use by installing these pop out outlets. Their innovative design is perfect for a modern and minimalistic home – when you need them, a simple push from your finger reveals a pop-out outlet cube ready for use.
